account-verification-mail.subject: Composite - Verify your email address
account-verification-mail.title: We are delighted to welcome you
account-verification-mail.paragraph:
Thank you for joining. To confirm the creation of your Composite account, please click on the link bellow.

For security reasons, this link is only valid for 24 hours.

reset-password-mail.subject: Reset your password
reset-password-mail.title: Forgot your password? No problem, let's create a new one!
reset-password-mail.paragraph:
If you need to reset your password, just click the button below to choose a new one!

For security reasons, this link is only valid for one hour.

If you didn’t request to change your password, you don’t have to do anything, your account stay secure, and your password remains unchanged.

sign-up-mail.subject: Discover Composite
sign-up-mail.title: Discover Composite
sign-up-mail.paragraph: Composite, is a cooperative and interactive experience where light and shadow try to find their way.
